snippet: Indianapolis rookie Andrew Luck faced the Jets, whose own quarterback, Mark Sanchez, has also dealt with the pressure of being counted on to be a team savior.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column compares experience of Indianapolis Colts rookie quarterback Andrew Luck to that of New York Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez, noting that both have felt the pressure of being counted on to be a team savior.
lead_paragraph: Indianapolis rookie Andrew Luck faced the Jets, whose own quarterback, Mark Sanchez, has also dealt with the pressure of being counted on to be a team savior.

headline.seo: For Colts’ Andrew Luck, a Shared Lesson
headline.main: A Familiar Lesson in Having Little to Work With
headline.print_headline: A Familiar Lesson in Having Little to Work With
